content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting the apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. What amount were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Herr Heine. I appreciate your time and effort in showing me the apartment. Regarding the rental price, I was hoping for something around 800 Euros per month, all-inclusive. This would cover all utilities and any additional costs. Is this within a reasonable range for the apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer of 800 Euros per month is quite generous considering the size of the apartment. However, I must admit that it is slightly below my expectations. I was hoping for a price closer to 900 Euros per month, which I believe is a fair market value for this prime location in Munich. Would you be willing to negotiate towards that figure?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Herr Heine, your expertise in real estate is evident, and I respect your knowledge of the market. While 900 Euros per month is indeed a fair market value, I must negotiate on behalf of myself as a student. I am looking for a price that aligns with my budget, which is why I proposed 800 Euros. Would it be possible to meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps at 850 Euros? This would still be a significant contribution on my part.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, as a student, I understand that you have to manage your expenses carefully. A price in the middle ground is indeed a reasonable request. Let's settle at 825 Euros per month. This is a fair compromise that takes into account both your budget and my expectations. Do we have a deal at 825 Euros?
name: Heinrich Heine
